value.title: Write if statements like a Pro in Power Query
value.excerpt: As the title says, in this video I will show you how to write if-statements like a pro: 00:00 The ultimate if-statement 00:40 if statement in Excel wont work 01:50 Use power query user interface to write if statement 03:00 Nested if-statements 03:38 AND/OR conditions in if statements 04:48 NOT condition

value.title: Deployment Pipelines give you more CONTROL (Power BI Premium)
value.excerpt: With Deployment Pipelines, you can control your application life cycle stages. Keep content in sync at the different stages of your development. Power BI Premium is required.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/deployment-pipelines-overview https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/deployment-pipelines-process

value.title: Do you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI? Nope! (Quick Measures)
value.excerpt: Everyone tells you that you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI. Not so fast! Patrick shows you how you can use quick measures, like year over year, with a quick measure and no date table!  Download Sample: https://guyinacu.be/quickmeasuresample  üì¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Dynamically change chart axis in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick builds on a blog post from Scott Senkeresty to dynamically change the axis of your visual within Power BI. This uses a combination of Power Query and DAX.  Chris Cook - @Finalyst89  Scott Senkeresty ‚Äì @ScottSenkeresty  Dynamically changing chart axis http://tinylizard.com/dynamically-changing-chart-axis/

value.title: Looking at Power BI Many to Many
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick takes a look at Power BI Many to Many relationships. This was part of the July 2018 Power BI Desktop release and can enable some awesome capabilities. Patrick looks at why you may not want to use Power BI Many to Many even though you think you do.  Many to Many documentation:¬†https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/desktop-many-to-many-relationships

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Dynamically Filter By Today's Date

value.title: Power BI Reports and Buttons (new with Power BI Desktop - April 2018)
